biography.bio: Ludwig Schmitz was born on January 28, 1884 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He was an actor, known for Der keusche Josef (1953), Der dunkle Punkt (1940) and Das Verlegenheitskind (1938). He died on June 28, 1954 in Münster, North Rhine-Westphalia.
biography.name: Ludwig Schmitz

biography.bio: Waltraut Haas was born on June 9, 1927 in Vienna, Austria as Waltraute Haas. She is an actress, known for Mon ami le clown (1955), Premier avril an 2000 (1952) and The White Horse Inn (1960). She was previously married to Erwin Strahl.
biography.name: Waltraut Haas

biography.bio: Renate Mannhardt was born on November 20, 1920 in Barmen, Germany. She was an actress, known for Fear (1954), L'homme perdu (1951) and Die große Versuchung (1952). She died in July 2013 in New York City, New York, USA.
biography.name: Renate Mannhardt

biography.bio: Peter Mosbacher was born on February 17, 1912 in Mannheim, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Petite maman (1950), Diaboliquement vôtre (1967) and Deadly Decision (1954). He was married to Edith Schneider. He died on October 9, 1977 in Kempfenhausen, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Peter Mosbacher

biography.bio: Lucie Englisch was born on February 8, 1902 in Baden, Lower Austria, Austria-Hungary as Paula Aloisia Englisch. She was an actress, known for Mother Holly (1961), Crook and the Cross (1960) and Die Entwicklungshilfe (1964). She was married to Heinrich Fuchs. She died on October 12, 1965 in Erlangen, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Lucie Englisch

biography.bio: Ernst Waldow was born on August 22, 1893 in Berlin, Germany as Ernst Hermann Adolf De Wolff. He was an actor, known for The Haunted Castle (1960), The Affair Blum (1948) and Drei Tage Mittelarrest (1955). He died on June 5, 1964 in Hamburg, Germany.
biography.name: Ernst Waldow

biography.bio: Gunther Philipp was born on June 8, 1918 in Maroshévíz, Hungary, Austria-Hungary as Gunther Placheta. He was an actor and writer, known for Banana Joe (1982), Das Fenster-Theater (2002) and Unsere tollen Tanten (1961). He was married to Gisela Kirchberg, Monika S., Anna-Maria Huber and Friederike Mayrhofer. He died on October 2, 2003 in Bonn, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
biography.name: Gunther Philipp

biography.bio: Ewald Wenck was born on December 28, 1891 in Berlin, Germany as Hermann Ewald Wenck. He was an actor, known for Ce diable de garçon (1944), Das Geschenk (1935) and Vom Regen in die Traufe (1937). He died on April 30, 1981 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Ewald Wenck

biography.bio: Herbert Kiper was born on April 17, 1897 in Wiesbaden, Hesse, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Mon ami le clown (1955), Heart of Stone (1950) and Rauschende Melodien (1955). He died on April 9, 1978 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Herbert Kiper

biography.bio: Alexa von Porembsky was born on June 5, 1906 in Ödenburg, Austria-Hungary. She was an actress, known for Die Safeknacker-Suite (1963), Kohlhiesel's Daughters (1962) and Woman in the Moon (1929). She died on August 18, 1981 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Alexa von Porembsky

biography.bio: Karin von Dassel was born on January 30, 1930 in Koblenz, Germany. She was an actress, known for Le pays du sourire (1952), Le Faux Adam (1955) and Der keusche Josef (1953). She died on October 14, 2013.
biography.name: Karin von Dassel

biography.bio: Elena Luber was born on April 3, 1914 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany as Helene Lüber. She is an actress, known for Beate (1948), In cerca di felicità (1944) and Frauen, Filme, Fernsehfunk (1953). She was previously married to Carl Boese.
biography.name: Elena Luber

biography.bio: Erich Kestin was born on June 25, 1895 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ferner liefen (1934), It's Great to Be in Love (1934) and Ich versichere Sie (1934). He died on May 22, 1969 in Berlin.
biography.name: Erich Kestin

biography.bio: Erwin Biegel was born on March 25, 1896 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor, known for Der andere Mann (1937), Nights in Andalusia (1938) and Der Besserwisser (1937). He died on May 24, 1954 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Erwin Biegel

biography.bio: Bruno Fritz was born on March 4, 1900 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ein Mann für Jenny (1956), Familie Musici (1968) and Die Ballade vom Cowboy (1969). He died on June 12, 1984 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Bruno Fritz
